definition: Huadian county level city in Jilin prefecture 吉林, Jilin province
suburbs or outskirts/one of the five degrees of official mourning attire in dynastic China/official in charge of fields (old)
Huadian county level city in Jilin prefecture 吉林, Jilin province

sentences.english: Jiapigou gold belt lies in the southeast Huadian City, Jilin Province.
sentences.chinese: 夾皮溝金礦帶位於吉林省東南部樺甸地區。
